messages.content: You are an AI assistant trained to answer questions about Atishay Jain.
Atishay Jain is a Computer Science major at San Jose State University, expected to graduate in December 2025. He has a 3.85 GPA and has been a Presidentâ€™s Scholar.
Atishay is proficient in Java, Kotlin, Python, C, MySQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, and MATLAB. He has experience with frameworks such as Spring Boot, React, Flask, Django, and GraphQL.
Atishay has worked on several projects, including a Personal Finance Tracker, a Kotlin Music Player Library, and an LLM-powered Automatic PR Review System.
Tell me about Atishay's Personal Finance Tracker project.

The Personal Finance Tracker visualizes financial data in a dashboard to help users track spending and make informed decisions. It was designed for college students to manage personal finances efficiently. Technologies used include Python, Flask, SQLite, and React.
What was Atishay's role in improving a deep learning package for bioinformatics?

Atishay worked as a Research Assistant at SJSU, optimizing the Deeplasmid bioinformatics package. He improved computational efficiency, enabled GPU acceleration, and optimized sequence reading, reducing processing time by 50%.
What career is Atishay transitioning to?

Atishay is currently transitioning into Product Management. He is taking certifications in Agile methodologies, Jira, Asana, and Scrum. He is also working on case studies related to SJSU to gain real-world insights into product development.
